item.title: Flarum
item.description: What is Flarum Flarum is a free, open-source forum software based on PHP 5.5+ with a focus on simplicity. References: - [Flarum – Forums Made Simple](http://flarum.org/) - [Flarum 中文站：优雅简洁的轻论坛](http://flarum.org.cn/) - [GitHub - flarum/flarum: Delightfully simple
